attributes.action: Use his influence and relationship with the American government to petition action against airial shooting of Alaskan wolves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
U.S. federal law on airial hunting is being breached by tourist type hunting parties, promoted by some American government officials, who offer bounties and rewards for succesfull shooting and culling of endangered species wildlife in Alaska, including wolves and bears.
Hundreds of these creatures are hunted to exhaustion, and die in obvious agony as disruption is caused to the natural ecosystems within this area. 
We want our government to stand up for the rights of these magnificent creatures to exist and to end the barbaric actions of bloodthirsty, arrogant human hunters who end the lives of endangered species in the name of "sport."
